DanaKarya adalah platform crowdfunding y: DanaKarya is a crowdfunding platform dedicated to helping Indonesian Micro, Small, and Medium Enterprises (MSMEs) grow and realize their dreams. We believe that every small business has great potential to bring positive change to Indonesian society and economy.
Melalui platform kami, para pemilik UMKM: Through our platform, MSME owners can submit campaigns to get funding from a caring community of backers.
